climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Quieter Click: Logitech’s SilentTouch Technology reduces over 90 percent (1) of clicking sounds while ensuring top performance, meaning you can feel every single click but hear virtually nothing
Crafted for Comfort: With contoured grips made of soft rubber, the noiseless M330 SILENT PLUS mouse is built to give great comfort to right-handed users
Long Life: This cordless mouse has a 24-month battery life (2), and automatically switches to sleep mode when not in use, allowing you to focus on your work without the hassle of changing batteries
Advanced Optical Tracking: With a wireless range of up to 33 ft (3), this quiet computer mouse provides high-performance precision and smart cursor control on most surfaces
Plug and Play: Plug the USB mini-receiver into your Windows, Mac, Chrome, OS, or Linux computer and forget about it; you can even add more compatible wireless devices without using multiple USB ports
Compatible with Chromebook: This product is tested and certified as Works With Chromebook (4), which means it meets Google’s compatibility standards and works seamlessly with your Chromebook
Upgrade to Logitech M590 Silent Wireless Mouse: Increase productivity with M590's USB/Bluetooth connectivity, multi-device functionality, horizontal scrolling, and 6 customizable buttons
body.description: With the same click feel and over 90% noise reduction* compared to classic mice, M330 silent Plus offers a quiet experience for yourself and those around you. It has a long-lasting 24-month battery life with auto-sleep and a powerful 10-meter wireless range** with 128-bit encryption between the mouse and the receiver. Plus, it's designed with contoured grips made of soft rubber for total comfort. Just plug the tiny USB receiver and it works with Windows, Mac, Chrome OS or Linux. Finally, the Logitech advanced optical tracking s smooth and precise moves on almost any surface. *sound level comparison between M330 silent Plus and Logitech M170. Measured by an independent lab. **actual wireless range may vary based on use, settings, and environmental conditions. *sound level comparison between M330 silent Plus and Logitech M170. Measured by an independent lab . **actual wireless range may vary based on use, settings, and environmental conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PORTABLE AND COMPACT Portable, compact, and wireless, this mouse fits easily with your computer in a bag so you can use on-the-go. HIGH-PRECISION TRACKING M330 silent plus offers next-level cursor control for ideal navigation on most surfaces. PRECISE SCROLLING The precision scroll wheel with tactile feel allows you to scroll with line-by-line precision. QUIET GLIDING The gliding feet are made of plastic lumber material which is quieter and more durable than other materials.

LESS NOISE, MORE FOCUS Stay focused on your work without noise distractions. Logitech’s own SilentTouch Technology reduces over 90% of clicking sounds. That means you can feel every single click but hear virtually nothing.

ALL-DAY COMFORT The asymmetric shape of M330 is crafted to guide your right hand to a natural position, while the soft rubber surface improves tactile feeling. It allows you to work or study comfortably for hours.

QUALITY YOU CAN COUNT ON Durable and reliable, M330 works up to 18 months without changing batteries. PLUG & PLAY WIRELESS M330 works on most OS (Windows, macOS, Linux), plus, it’s a certified Works with Chromebook product. Plug the USB receiver into your device to get the wireless connection within up to 10 m.

ESSENTIAL TOOLS. BETTER WORK. Get the full Logitech setup to work better staying comfortable and productive. The easy-to-install mouse, keyboard, and webcam give you all the functionality to work easily and command your space. LOGITECH WIRELESS KEYBOARD K360 This compact wireless keyboard is ideal for narrower built or constricted workspaces. Equipped with a number pad and 12 easy access keys, you can be more productive -at home or at work. Learn more LOGITECH C920 HD PRO WEBCAM Be seen in remarkably crisp, full HD video - plus clear stereo sound. Learn more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Logitech M330 SILENT PLUS Wireless Mouse
reviews.reviewText: The Logitech M330 SILENT PLUS Wireless Mouse has revolutionized my computing experience, and I am eager to share my thoughts on this exceptional peripheral. As someone who values a peaceful environment and seamless functionality, this mouse has exceeded my expectations in every aspect.First and foremost, the standout feature of this mouse is its silent operation. The near-silent clicks and ultra-quiet scrolling make it a game-changer for those who work in shared spaces, libraries, or quiet offices. The reduction in noise is remarkable and has significantly contributed to a more tranquil and focused work environment.In addition to its silent operation, the mouse maintains Logitech's renowned standard of quality and performance. The ergonomic design fits comfortably in my hand, providing a natural grip that minimizes strain during extended use. The wireless connectivity via the 2.4GHz receiver ensures a reliable and lag-free connection, offering the freedom to work without being tethered to the computer.The battery life of the M330 SILENT PLUS is impressive, delivering up to 24 months of usage on a single AA battery. This exceptional longevity means that I can go about my work without the inconvenience of frequently replacing or recharging the battery.The precision and responsiveness of the mouse are outstanding, allowing for smooth and accurate cursor control across various surfaces. Whether I'm working on a desk, couch, or even my lap, the mouse tracks consistently and reliably.Setup was a breeze, as the mouse is plug-and-play, requiring no additional software installation. This simplicity, combined with the reliable wireless connectivity, ensures a hassle-free user experience.In summary, the Logitech M330 SILENT PLUS Wireless Mouse has become an indispensable tool for my daily computing needs. Its silent operation, ergonomic design, long battery life, and reliable performance have elevated my productivity and comfort during work hours.Pros:1. Near-silent clicks and ultra-quiet scrolling enhance the work environment.2. Comfortable and ergonomic design reduces hand strain during extended use.3. Long battery life of up to 24 months minimizes interruptions.4. Reliable wireless connectivity via the 2.4GHz receiver.5. Plug-and-play setup for a hassle-free user experience.Cons:I have not encountered any drawbacks with this mouse. It has proven to be an exceptional addition to my computing setup.In conclusion, the Logitech M330 SILENT PLUS Wireless Mouse has set a new standard for quiet and efficient computing. Its silent operation, ergonomic design, and reliable performance make it a standout choice for anyone seeking a comfortable and unobtrusive computing experience. I highly recommend it to individuals working in shared environments or anyone who values a peaceful workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this mouse!
reviews.reviewText: I am a mobile gamer. I originally bought this mouse about two years ago. When it says this mouse is silent, it is silent! The clicks are smooth and light. I play games like League of Legends, Diablo and Path of Exile, which are games that require constant use and clicking of the mouse. When I say constant clicking, I mean hundreds and hundreds of clicks a minute. My original mouse lasted me over a year, then eventually the left mouse button stopped functioning. I am more than impressed with the longevity of the mouse, especially with the constant torture I put it through. The mouse got used easily 8-12 hours a day with constant clicking and gaming and held up over a year. When my first one broke, I bought a different mouse and was I unimpressed. The new mouse claimed to be silent, but I soon learned, it was not. Hearing hundreds of back to back loud clicks every minute gets old in less than a minute. I instantly spent the little bit more and bought this mouse again. The profile of the mouse is nice, and the way it sits in your hand is also nice. It has a smooth and low profile and isn’t bulky like some other mice. The wireless signal is also good, I’ve stood up to 15 ft away from my laptop and still been able to use the mouse totally fine! I would highly recommend this to anyone! Overall is a great mouse to use and is an outstanding product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, silent mouse for the price
reviews.reviewText: For $20 this mouse is very high quality with super quiet clicks that feel really good, great size and weight to it, plus wireless. You’re not gonna find a better wireless mouse for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's The Real Deal!
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this! Packaging was super easy to open from the back. The mouse's USB receiver was inside the battery compartment so don't panic if you don't see it right away. Very clever hiding spot. And the setup was very simple. Just plug and play.The design is very ergonomic. It fits the right hand perfectly with a comfortable spot to rest the thumb. But the main thing that I love about it is that it's silent! Like truly silent. I'm still getting used to the lack of noise when I left click and right click.I will say though, the scrolling wheel is not silent. Now I don't usually use the scrolling wheel that much anyways, so I'm okay with it. But if you're somebody who uses it a lot and need a silent scrolling wheel, then it could be deal-breaker. But otherwise, it's an excellent mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice enough, fades over time.
reviews.reviewText: This worked great for regular use, but after about six weeks there is serious lag. Even after trying different battery brands, this thing just seems to lose it mid scroll. Can't even see using this as a gaming mouse, as it now has a hard time adjusting to it's location onscreen. Decent for everyday casual use, if you can get past it resetting itself or whatever. I wouldn't use this for gaming, though. Too unreliable. Also very small. The quiet clicking feature is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and smooth
reviews.reviewText: Love how quiet this is and it works well.Good size for medium hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My laptop mouse died, so I grabbed the one from my PC, and it was so loud! The clicking. It was so irritating. So, I shopped for a new mouse, and saw this one. It is absolutely silent! I've never seen a mouse like that. The buttons also take very little effort to tap. If you rest your finger, you might get an accidental click, but no sound! It is on the small side, so for those with larger hands or who just prefer a larger mouse, this may not be for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse BUT..
reviews.reviewText: It is for RIGHT HANDED people. As far as I could find it does not come in a left hand version. Still works great and is really quiet, and is not uncomfortable to use, but noticeably designed for right handers.

reviews.reviewTitle: It will completely change your mouse experience
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is really silent and because of its ergonomic design it fits perfectly in my hands.

reviews.reviewTitle: Acredito que o produto é original.
reviews.reviewText: Na primeira foto, minha experiência como cliente não foi agradável, pois apesar de bem protegido pela embalagem inflável e o mouse estar dentro de um "saquinho", não veio ao menos na caixinha e o manual.Quando abri, logo pensei em devolver pensando que o produto seria de péssima qualidade.Porém comecei a me surpreender aos poucos, pois a aparência do mouse é bonita sim.Os desenhos laterais não são exatamente iguais do anúncio, porém é detalhe de baixa relevância e não é emborrachado. Prefiro assim pois é melhor para limpar.Na parte de baixo, o que me levou a crer na originalidade do produto é o que mesmo tem detalhes brilhantes em baixo relevo (Ex: a inscrição M330) assim como é demonstrado em produtos originais na fábrica pois produtos falsificados não tem detalhe nenhum, é mal construído e material de baixa qualidade.Dentro também, tem etiqueta com o número de série do produto e consegui registrar no site da Logitech.Receptor é Logitech.Na parte superior, o LED é funcional e acende quando é tocado para indicar o estado da bateria.Clique SILENCIOSO sim!Resumo: Gostei do produto, mas como não veio manual, espero não precisar usar uma garantia do produto e ter problemas por isso.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quiet clicking and scrolling. Very comfortable as well, I prefer this to the M220 as it is more robust

Logitech es mi marca favorita en mouse, los clicks son bastante silenciosos.Lo malo: Produce un sonido bastante audible al girar la rueda y luego de unos meses de uso empieza a desgastarse la superficie del mouse donde se apoya la mano.
Much better battery life than M195/M198.Smooth transmission and works smoothly.Nothing to complain about, price is great for the product.
